title: CareerBuilder Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape jobs from CareerBuilder.com. Use either a direct CareerBuilder URL OR provide keyword/location. Supports pagination and extracts job details using JSON-LD structured data.

startUrl.title: Start URL (Option 1)
startUrl.description: Direct CareerBuilder search URL. Example: https://www.careerbuilder.com/jobs-accounting-and-auditing-near-me?posted=1&radius=50&cb_apply=false. If provided, keyword/location will be ignored.

keyword.title: Keyword (Option 2)
keyword.description: Job search keyword(s). Examples: 'Software Developer', 'Accountant', 'Marketing Manager'. Only used if Start URL is not provided.

location.title: Location (Option 2)
location.description: Geographic location. Examples: 'New York, NY', 'San Francisco, CA', 'Remote'. Only used if Start URL is not provided.

posted_date.title: Posted Date Filter
posted_date.description: Filter jobs by posting date. Note: Only applies when using keyword/location, not when using Start URL.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of jobs to scrape. Scraper stops when this limit is reached.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search result pages to visit. Safety limit to prevent excessive crawling.
